item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH side and LH side.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.
A bolt without a torque specification is shown in the standard bolt chart (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT CUSHION COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Install the front seat cushion cover LH to the front seat inner belt assembly LH.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the RH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Install the front seat inner belt assembly LH with the nut.

atten3.ptxt: Do not overlap the anchor part of the front seat inner belt assembly LH and protruding part of the front seat cushion frame sub-assembly LH.

s2.ptxt: Attach the wire harness to the clamp.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the front seat inner belt assembly RH with the nut.

atten3.ptxt: Do not overlap the anchor part of the front seat inner belt assembly RH and protruding part of the front seat cushion frame sub-assembly RH.

s2.ptxt: Attach the wire harness to the clamp.
Connect the connector and attach the 2 clamps as shown in the illustration.
Install the front seat assembly LH (See page ).

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.
